feature_description: Create an email to be automatically sent at a specified future time
prompt: Use Gmail to schedule an email to team@company.com for tomorrow at 8:00 AM with the subject 'Weekly Status Update' and the message 'Team, we will discuss the progress in our 10 AM meeting tomorrow. Regards, Joseph'
expected_behaviour:
The agent should:
1. Open the default email client
2. Create a new email with recipient team@company.com
3. Set the subject to "Weekly Status Update"
4. Type the requested message in the body
5. Use the email client's scheduling feature to set delivery for 8:00 AM the next day
6. Confirm the scheduling of the email
7. Report back that the email has been scheduled successfully
